page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO AREA
page.content: THE AREA COVERED IS VERY MIXED AND INCLUDES PARTS OF CROXLEY GREEN(A VILLAGE SITUATED BETWEEN WATFORD AND RICKMANSWORTH), RICKMANSWORTH AND CHORLEYWOOD. THE WHOLE AREA COMES UNDER THE JURISDICTION OF THREE RIVERS COUNCIL. IT IS SO NAMED BECAUSE OF THE THREE RIVERS THAT FLOW THROUGH THE AREA; THE GADE, THE COLNE AND THE CHESS. IT IS MAINLY A RESIDENTIAL AREA, ALTHOUGH THERE IS STILL A GREAT DEAL OF FARMLAND AND WOODLAND BECAUSE IT IS PROTECTED BY THE GREEN BELT. IT IS APPROXIMATELY TWENTY MILES FROM LONDON AND MANY RESIDENTS COMMUTE DIRECTLY TO LONDON EVERY DAY BY BUS AND TRAIN.
